LAMDA.AT.summary: LAMDA Development S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, development, and management of various real estate projects in Greece, Serbia, Romania, and Montenegro. Its development portfolio includes three shopping and leisure centers, including the Mall Athens and Golden Hall in Athens, as well as Mediterranean Cosmos in Thessaloniki; office complex in Greece and Romania; and Flisvos Marina in Faliro, as well as office buildings and residential complexes. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Marousi, Greece.
